body:
@SsnL I noticed that the other modifications also have similar bugs.  

- ger operation 
[Intel manual](https://software.intel.com/en-us/mkl-developer-reference-c-cblas-ger) explains that 
~~~
For Layout = CblasColMajor, the value of lda must be at least max(1, m).

For Layout = CblasRowMajor, the value of lda must be at least max(1, n).
~~~
Howerver, the modification does not check the transposing info and give the limit condition
~~~
(lda >= THMax(1, n)) && (lda <= INT_MAX) &&
~~~

- gemv operation
[Intel manual](https://software.intel.com/en-us/mkl-developer-reference-c-cblas-gemv) explains that
~~~ 
For Layout = CblasColMajor, the value of lda must be at least max(1, m).

For Layout = CblasRowMajor, the value of lda must be at least max(1, n).
~~~
A similar bug also exsits.
~~~
(lda >= THMax(1, n)) && (lda <= INT_MAX) &&
~~~
